==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Och-Kan

|name_1      = Flamebreath
|desc_1      = Shoots fire from its mouth and sweeps across an area in front of it, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} on hit.

|name_2      = Wing Swipe
|desc_2      = Attacks with one of its wings, dealing '''40% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}}.

|name_3      = Sweep and Charge
|desc_3      = Sweeps the ground around itself with one wing, then drills forward at the player, dealing '''50% ATK''', '''55% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}}. Repeated hits dealt by the charge have their DMG reduced according to the [[Damage Sequence]].

|name_4      = Charge
|desc_4      = Charges at the player, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} on hit, then follows with two quick wing slashes, each dealing '''45% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}}. If the first wing slash hits the player, the DMG of the second wing slash is halved according to the [[Damage Sequence]].

|name_5      = Charged Shockwave
|desc_5      = Begins charging. While charging, gains a [[Void Ward]] which grants it immunity to DMG. The void barrier has a durability of '''20'''. The durability will reduce by '''1''' when hit by an Elemental attack, '''3''' when hit by a [[Nightsoul]]-aligned attack. When charging completes, raises then slams both of its wings, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} around itself. Then, causes 3 additional explosion around the arena, each dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}}. If the Void Ward is destroyed, charging will be interrupted and Och-Kan will be paralyzed.
|file_5_2    = Och-Kan Charged Shockwave 2
|caption_5_2 = Paralyzed

|name_6      = Golden Flame
|desc_6      = Becomes airborne and fires a beam of energy at the player, continuously dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} upon contact.
}}
